## PopulatableBitcoinsMoneyp class

Bitcoins-based implementation of [PopulatableMoneyp](./lib-base.populatablemoneyp.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PopulatableBitcoinsMoneyp implements PopulatableMoneyp<BitcoinsTransactionReceipt, BitcoinsTransactionResponse, BitcoinsPopulatedTransaction> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [PopulatableMoneyp](./lib-base.populatablemoneyp.md)<!-- -->&lt;[BitcoinsTransactionReceipt](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionreceipt.md)<!-- -->, [BitcoinsTransactionResponse](./lib-ethers.bitcoinstransactionresponse.md)<!-- -->, [BitcoinsPopulatedTransaction](./lib-ethers.bitcoinspopulatedtransaction.md)<!-- -->&gt;

|  [repayBPD(amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.populatablebitcoinsmoneyp.repaybpd.md) |  | Adjust existing Vault by repaying some of its debt. |
|  [sendBPD(toAddress, amount, overrides)](./lib-ethers.populatablebitcoinsmoneyp.sendbpd.md) |  | Send BPD tokens to an address. |
